short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert structured HTML content into a plain text format that can be imported into tools like Quizlet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are using Canvas at your school and want to quickly convert your completed quiz into a txt file that you can upload onto Quizlet to make into flashcards, this extension is for you!
